title: More unmarked graves discovered in British Columbia at a former indigenous residential school known as 'Canada's Alcatraz'
content:
1. More unmarked graves discovered in British Columbia at a former indigenous residential school known as 'Canada's Alcatraz'  CNN
  2. More than 160 unmarked graves found on Penelakut Tribe territory, First Nation says | APTN News  APTN News
  3. Canada PM: 'Heart breaks' with more Indigenous graves found  Yahoo News
  4. At least 160 undocumented graves found at B.C. residential school  CityNews
  5. More unmarked residential school graves discovered in Canada  Al Jazeera English

localize.title: ブリティッシュ・コロンビア州の「カナダのアルカトラズ」と呼ばれる旧先住民居住学校で、さらに無名の墓が発見されました。
不列颠哥伦比亚省被称为 "加拿大恶魔岛 "的前原住民寄宿学校发现更多无名墓穴
不列顛哥倫比亞省被稱爲 "加拿大惡魔島 "的前原住民寄宿學校發現更多無名墓穴
